subject: Re: [junit] JUnit works great in IDE, how do I run it from a shell?
msgSnippet: ... This worked great. It still runs it from Netbeans, but it generates the output that I m looking for. Thanks. I d still like to figure out what it takes to
messageBody:
Jan Cumps wrote:
> 2: change formatter :
> <formatter type="brief" usefile="true"/>

This worked great.
It still runs it from Netbeans, but it generates the output
that I'm looking for. Thanks.

I'd still like to figure out what it takes to get
ant to fire up the junit tests from a Bash shell,
but this lets me send the results off to the PHB.

Thanks

--
Pat Farrell pfarrell@...
www.aframedigital.com
